Module project.notizprogrammrepository
Package project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.entries

Class TodoEntry

java.lang.Object
project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.entries.Entry
project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.entries.TodoEntry
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TodoEntry extends Entry
An Entry to a todolist.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private long
    id
    The id of the Entry used for comparison between 2 entries.
    private int
    priority
    The priority of the Entry ranging from 0 to ten where 0 is the top priority.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TodoEntry(String title)
    Creates a TodoEntry with the given title and sets its priority to 10.
    TodoEntry(String title, int priority)
    Creates a TodoEntry with the given title and priority.
    TodoEntry(String title, String text, Date dueDate, int priority)
    Creates a TodoEntry with a title, text, dueDate and priority.
    TodoEntry(String title, Date dueDate)
    Creates a TodoEntry with a title, and a dueDate and sets its priority to 10.

      title - The title of the Entry.
      priority - The priority of the Entry. (0 = highest; 10 = lowest)

    • TodoEntry

      public TodoEntry(String title, Date dueDate)
      Creates a TodoEntry with a title, and a dueDate and sets its priority to 10.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the Entry.
      dueDate - The date when the content of the Entry is due.

    • TodoEntry

      public TodoEntry(String title, String text, Date dueDate, int priority)
      Creates a TodoEntry with a title, text, dueDate and priority.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the Entry.
      text - The text of the Entry.
      dueDate - The date when the content of the Entry is due.
      priority - The priority of the Entry. (0 = highest; 10 = lowest)
